title: ASUS ZenFone 7 and 7 Pro start receiving stable Android 12 update
content:
ASUS has been hard at work releasing Android 12 updates for its smartphone portfolio. Last week, the Taiwanese OEM published a beta build of Android 12 for the two-year-old ROG Phone 3. The ZenFone 7 and 7 Pro, ASUSâ€™ mainstream flagships from 2020, were also in line to receive the same treatment. True to its

The post ASUS ZenFone 7 and 7 Pro start receiving stable Android 12 update appeared first on XDA.
description: As promised, ASUS has begun rolling out the stable Android 12 update to the ZenFone 7 series, which includes plenty of new features.
